name: Elemental Escape (laracat0801, QuinnOfHearts, Hydrophobic Whale, Breadatarian)
name_original: Elemental Escape (laracat0801, QuinnOfHearts, Hydrophobic Whale, Breadatarian)
description:
Made for Kiwijam 2021
"Adapt" Description:

Escape the tower and adapt to the obstacles ahead, by  gaining and mastering the 4 elements of Fire, Earth, Wind, and Water!

How to Play:

WASD to move. If acquired: 1 for Fire , 2 for Earth,  Space Bar after jumping for Air.

Team Cranberry JAM:
  • Chanya Ussaneerungrueng (QuinnOfHearts)
  • James Monk (Breadatarian)
  • Angeline Moneda (laracat0801)
  • Matt Mattar (Hydrophobic Whale)

Only one team member had prior Unreal Engine experience in the making of this game!
